Slogan: The speciality dedicate to the information system and software engineering
AboutText: Companies have to develop Information Systems and complex software which primary qualities are their abilities to evolve, their reliability as well as their performance. Companies needs are evolving ever faster with the apparition of new market actors and disruptive business models backed up by the promise of new technologies, even more connected and cheaper than ever. There is a need to go faster in order to transform the existing systems and create the new business services for today and tommorrow : Online Presence, Interconnection with all Informaiton Systems, new real-time services, better knowing of clients.
ModulesIntro: In order to better prepare our students for the business community, SIGL specialty is focused on 4 majors topics, every one of which bringing a part of the skills and culture required in order to build tommorrow's technologies
M&AText: Discover and grasp the new software challenges in order to integrate itself in growing mobility requirements
C&AText: Understanding the building and functionning process of Information Systems as well as its technical architeture. Discovering Cloud technologies and Big Data
L&MText: Handling the new business models in order to answer the IT governance's new requirements and train tommorrow's managers
D&TText: Undestanding and make Digital Transformation viable for companies as well as the new innovation levers provided by the IT
ARCLText: Creation of an hybrid cloud using Openstack technologies as well as Paas Services such as AWS or Microsoft Azure
VIRTText: Business case realization based on cost lines and savings levers
IOTText: Creation of an IoT Object and realize Marketing processes (Business Case, Commercial) as well as the realization
PAEText: Group Project in partnership with several companies : Profesionnal Relationships, Société Générale, Korn Ferry...
URSIText: Creation of an Information System simulating a Retail company's behavior
WTText: Two-sided project realized with modern web technologies (Free Choice) : ROR, Javascript, Golang...
PMSText: SIGL, Security and Network students work together in order to propose a transformation solution
MEPAText: Scrum-Compliant Project realized in group of 4
ARCHText: Class Project in order to understand all possible aspects of IS Arcitecture
LM_OPDI: OPDI : Information Systems Steering and Organization
LM_OPCO_text1: Being able to manage time, and efficiently apply a personnal organization
LM_OPCO_text2: Being able to reinforce professionnal efficiency using a better communication
LM_OPCO_text3: Being able to manage its own professionnal project
LM_AMOA_text1: Apprehend and understand Information System from a company's POV
LM_AMOA_text2: Identify roles, missions and positionning of Prject Management
LM_AMOA_text3: Define responsibilities between Project Management's business units
LM_AMOA_text4: Being Able to conduct an organizational study for IT products / services
LM_OPDI_text1: Understand digital impact on Information Systems
LM_OPDI_text4: Evaluate IT Projects' Return on Investment
LM_OPDI_text5: Understand IT System Department Cost Reduction Levers
LM_COIN_text3: Understand the keys concepts of communication and teamwork
LM_URSI_text1: Discover Information Systems reality in a company
LM_URSI_text2: Understand Middleware base that supports it
LM_URSI_text3: Understanding Integration issues within the Information System
LM_URSI_text4: Grasp the concept of innovation within the IS
LM_VIT1_text1: Sensitize issues about IT projects within the IS
LM_VIT1_text2: Understand basic concepts of ROI prediction
LM_VIT1_text3: Practice with study cases about virtualization
LM_ARCL_text1: Validate skills acquisition by building a private cloud and a cloud-based application
LM_ARCL_text2: Understand key notions of Cloud Computing
LM_SOAR_text1: Understand and practice the implementation of a Solution Architecture
LM_MEPA_text1: General concepts of development productivity's issues
LM_MEPA_text2: Experiment tools associated with Agile's planning and development methods
LM_MEPA_text3: Face issues such as repriorization and silver bullet
LM_ACOO_text3: Learn key concepts of UML and Object-oriented development
LM_NLPF_text: Understand culture of new programmation languages and frameworks
LM_DEVO_text1: Understand Devops added value against classical development methods
LM_DEVO_text2: Understand the DevOps transformation within a project
LM_ACCC_text1: Understad what's at stake during a transformation
LM_ACCC_text2: Learn key notions of Change Management
LM_INNO_text1: Use creative and innovative methods for problem solving
LM_PMDE_text1: Learn how to approach issues using dichotomy
LM_DIGI_text1: Autour de mon expérience dans le marché de l'art avec le développement des ventes Live en direct sur Internet. Je montre comment la digitalisation d'une industrie pré-existante dans le monde physique, en l’occurrence le marché de l'art et les ventes aux enchères publiques, est un mix entre innovation et transformation.
LM_DIGI_text2: J'aborde le sujet sous différents angles. Celui du média Interencheres et celui des commissaires-priseurs. Je tisse des parallèles avec le ecommerce et les industries de la distribution et du commerce.
LM_DIGI_text3: Un cours qui matérialise la différence entre innovation et transformation, qui propose une approche par phase de la digitalisation d'une industrie pré-existante au web. Qui esquisse des pistes pour réussir la conduite du changement. Qui montre la nécessité de procéder d'une vision à long-terme sans pour autant traîner en chemin quand les pure-players de l'Internet sont à l’affût
LM_VIT2_text1: Discuss financial and technological model based around cloud computing
LM_VIT2_text2: Apprehend unsollicited action with a client and elaborate a Business Case
LM_VIT2_text3: Understand key notions of cloud transformation
LM_METH_text2: Formation of conceptual models and there methods
LM_PERS_text1: Undestand and control the evolutions of the IT market.
LM_PERS_text2: Solve an enterprise problem by implementing an IoT solution
LM_PERS_text3: Develop synthesis, analysis and innovation skills
